header.title: CosNotifyChannelAdmin_ProxyPushSupplier

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosNotifyChannelAdmin::ProxyPushSupplier interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosNotification/include/*.hrl").
This module also exports the functions described in:

func.name: connect_any_push_consumer(ProxyPushSupplier, PushConsumer) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Connect a consumer to the proxy

desc.p: This operation connects a PushConsumer to the target object. If a connection already exists or the given client does not support the operation push an exception, AlreadyConnected and TypeError respectively, is raised.

func.name: suspend_connection(ProxyPushSupplier) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Suspend the connection between the proxy and the client

desc.p: This operation suspends the connection with the client object. If the connection already is suspended or no client have been associated an exception is raised.

func.name: resume_connection(ProxyPushSupplier) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Resume a previously suspended connection with the proxy

desc.p: If a connection have been suspended earlier, calling this operation will resume the connection. If the connection already is active or no client have been connected an exception is raised.

func.name: disconnect_push_supplier(ProxyPushSupplier) -> ok
func.fsummary: Close the connection and terminate the proxy

desc.p: This operation cause the target object to close the connection and terminate.
